nodes.text: The Sky Loop was a running track located high on the roof of the Royal Imperial Academy on the planet Coruscant. Two months into their time at the academy, the Imperial cadets Thane Kyrell and Nash Windrider ran nine laps together on the track amidst a pale fog created by clouds gathering around the academy. While on the track the two discussed how they were enjoying their time at the academy.
The Sky Loop first appeared in the novel Lost Stars, which was written by Claudia Gray and released in 2015.
